ygData.subject: Serious Everquest question, please help
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, Forgive my ignorance but I am a newbie had a 4th level Druid in the city of Elves and while out at the Orc Camp, with others, I got killed by an Orc
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,
 
Forgive my ignorance but I am a newbie had a 4th level Druid in the city of Elves and while out at the Orc Camp, with others, I got killed by an Orc Centurian and when I returned to get my corpse, nothing was there.  It was not more than 4 minutes when I returned.
 
Question: Is it possible for someone to Steal or Loot my corpse? The book says no but I beg to differ.
Is it possible that I had two corpses out there? Meaning, When I went back with a dead body I died again?  Which meant I found the wrong corpse?
 
And to add one last question, "what do I do now? seeing as I have no food, no money, no nothing?"  Do I beg or do I start another char?
This game is totally fun but with the fact of trying to learn which way to go all the time and dying, it is starting to get to me,
I don't want to give up just yet and I turned to this board since the Chat from the game options was USELESS.
 
Please help and Thanks in advance
 
Rob
----- Original Message -----
From: Su
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, January 05, 2002 5:54 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Dark Elves and Luclin

> The bazaar is directly connected to the Nexus and to ShadowHaven, both
> should be okay for a DE. They got chased onto the moon for allowing DE's
> into the Combine empire after all...
>
Cool!
>
> Shar Val(kitty city) also have horses for sale by one of the zone=in
> bridges, think East. Have seen a 50+ lvl DE running through the city.
>
Neat! I saw a horse but didn't see who was selling them. Do they let you
look at the horses before buying or something? How does that work?
Thanks!
luv,
-Su
>
>
> On Fri, 4 Jan 2002, Su wrote:
>
> >
> > You will be fine, the zone you buy horses in is neutral and not run by
> > Vah'Shir, though I think you can prolly buy horses in the vah'shir
> > hometown also..
> > >
> > I didn't see any for sale in that zone. From what I heard, they are only
for
> > sale in the bazaar and you have to be a high enough level to go through
the
> > joining zones.
> > But if anyone finds more info, I'd appreciate it.
> > luv,
> > -Su
